texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Over Christmas and New Year, most of the TfL network is open. However, there are some changes and planned works that may affect your journey."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
There are changes and planned works on the following services today. All our other services are running normally.
See our Status updates map for Friday 28 December for Tube, Overground, TfL Rail, DLR and tram services.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Tube"}
We are running a reduced Saturday service today.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["First and last trains are at weekday times","The first Central line trains between Hainault and Woodford are at Saturday times","The Waterloo \u0026 City line is running a reduced service","Night Tube services are running tonight"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"London Overground"}
There are changes to services today:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["A weekday service is running between Highbury \u0026 Islington and Crystal Palace / West Croydon","A Saturday service is running:ul","Reduced service between Gospel Oak and Barking. Trains will run every 15-30 minutes","No service between Romford and Upminster","No service between Edmonton Green and Cheshunt","Reduced service between Liverpool Street and Chingford (trains run about every 20 minutes, not stopping at Bethnal Green, Hackney Downs and Clapton)","Reduced service between Liverpool Street and Edmonton Green / Enfield Town (trains run about every 20 minutes, not stopping at Bethnal Green, Cambridge Heath, London Fields and Hackney Downs)","Please use replacement or local buses. Check \u003ca href=\"http://tfl.gov.uk/tube-dlr-overground/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2018-12-28T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2018-12-28T23%3a59%3a59#line-raillo-overground\"\u003eStatus updates\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Follow @LDNOverground for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"TfL Rail"}
There are changes to services today:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No service between Liverpool Street and Romford","Reduced service between Romford and Shenfield (trains run about every 15 minutes)","Reduced service between Paddington and Hayes \u0026 Harlington (trains run about every 30 minutes, not stopping at Acton Main Line, West Ealing or Hanwell)","Use replacement or local buses. Check \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/tube-dlr-overground/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2018-12-28T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2018-12-28T23%3a59%3a59#line-tfl-rail\"\u003eStatus updates\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Follow @TfLRail for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"DLR"}
We are running a Saturday service today.
Follow @LondonDLR for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Trams"}
We are running a Saturday service today.
Follow @TramsLondon for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Buses"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["We are running a Saturday service on day routes today","A normal Friday service is running on 24-hour and night routes","An enhanced Saturday service is running on route 507","A limited service is running on routes 521 and X68"]}
See all today's planned bus changes on our Bus status updates map for Friday 28 December .
Follow @TfLBusAlerts for news and service information.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Driving"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No access to Upper Street southbound from Highbury Corner from 04:00. A signed diversion will be in place. \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/highbury-corner-roundabout\"\u003eFind out more\u003c/a\u003e ","The Congestion Charge and T-Charge do not apply today","See our \u003ca href=\"http://tfl.gov.uk/traffic/status/?Input=\u0026lineIds=\u0026dateTypeSelect=Future date\u0026direction=\u0026startDate=2018-12-28T00%3a00%3a00\u0026endDate=2018-12-28T23%3a59%3a59\"\u003etraffic status updates map for Friday 28 December\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Follow @TfLTrafficNews on Twitter.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"National Rail"}
Check National Rail's Christmas page for information about service changes and planned works over the festive season.
